scripts.bundle:android: rm -rf dist/android && mkdir -p dist/android && react-native bundle --config rn/metro.config.js --platform android --dev false --entry-file src/index.js --assets-dest dist/android --bundle-output dist/android/index.android.bundle
scripts.bundle:ios: rm -rf dist/ios && mkdir -p dist/ios && react-native bundle --config rn/metro.config.js --platform ios --dev false --entry-file src/index.js --assets-dest dist/ios --bundle-output dist/ios/main.jsbundle
scripts.bundle:web: rm -rf dist/web && mkdir -p dist/web && webpack --no-watch --watch-options-stdin --no-color --no-devtool --config ./rn/web/webpack.config.js --mode production --output-path ./dist/web
scripts.bundle:all: set -euo pipefail && npm run bundle:android && npm run bundle:ios && npm run bundle:web
scripts.reset: set -euo pipefail && watchman watch-del-all && watchman shutdown-server && rm -rf .cache "$TMPDIR"/metro-{*,.*}
scripts.archive-install: bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; targets=(node_modules package-lock.json bun.lock bun.lockb); rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json bun.lock bun.lockb; npm i --no-audit --no-fund --progress=false; os=$(uname -s | tr "[:upper:]" "[:lower:]"); arch=$(uname -m); case "$arch" in amd64|x86_64) arch=x86_64;; aarch64|arm64) arch=arm64;; i386|i686) arch=x86;; esac; files=(); for p in "${targets[@]}"; do [[ -e "$p" ]] && files+=("$p"); done; if ((${#files[@]}==0)); then echo "Nothing to archive (no targets found)" >&2; exit 0; fi; tar -czf "node_modules-${os}-${arch}-node20.tar.gz" "${files[@]}"'
